system.description:
Effect: This attack is unaffected by the abilities of other creatures.
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Rillaboom and has a Grass-Type attack on their Active List.
